column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been to Common Bond several times to do work during the afternoon. I love the atmosphere at this bakery - large windows with lots of light
column3: and the wonderful smell of baked goods. I had only ordered tea and pastries before
column4: but I finally went there for breakfast the other day. For a Wednesday morning
column5: there were a lot of people around. It was about half full when I got there around 8
column6: but it was pretty full by the time I left at 9.
